title: The Bachelorette's biggest twist spoiled DAYS before Angie Kent's premiere
text:
Channel 10 accidentally revealed a major plot twist on The Bachelorette, just days before the season premiere.

Over the weekend, the network let slip that Instagram-famous rescue dog advocate Ryan Anderson is an intruder on the dating series.

Despite the fact Ryan's entrance is supposed to be top secret, The Bachelorette's verified Instagram account followed him on Sunday.

Whoops! Channel 10 accidentally revealed a major plot twist on The Bachelorette, just days before the season premiere. Pictured: Angie Kent

When The Bachelorette Instagram account followed Ryan, it also followed the first 20 contestants who had already been announced.

After eagle-eyed fans noticed this and began leaving comments about Ryan, The Bachelorette account promptly unfollowed him.

Tellingly, Ryan is also the only contestant Angie Kent is following on Instagram.

The secret's out! On Sunday, The Bachelorette's verified Instagram account followed Ryan Anderson (pictured), confirming he will appear on the show as an intruder

Does he go all the way? Ryan is also the only contestant Angie Kent is following on Instagram

The network later included footage of Angie kissing Ryan in a three-minute trailer for the show released on Sunday night.

In previous seasons of The Bachelorette, intruders have been kept under wraps until just before their arrival in the mansion.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel 10 for comment.

Isn't he meant to be a secret? Channel later included footage of Angie kissing Ryan (pictured) in a three-minute trailer for the show released on Sunday night

Spoiler alert! In previous seasons of The Bachelorette, intruders have been kept under wraps until just before their arrival in the mansion. Pictured: Ryan and Angie

Meanwhile, the 'super-cut' trailer also featured plenty of tears, tantrums and nudity, with cocky Englishman Ciarran Stott stripping off for a life drawing group date.

Angie couldn't look away as Ciarran bared all in front of her and the other suitors.

However, Ciarran's time on the show may be short-lived, as he was later shown storming out of a cocktail party in a fit of rage.

They love it! Angie couldn't look away as Ciarran bared all in front of her and the other suitors

That was quick! However, Ciarran's time on the show may be short-lived, as he was later shown storming out of a cocktail party in a fit of rage

Angie became emotional later in the trailer, breaking down in tears after sending a mystery man home and watching him leave the mansion.

Before being cast as The Bachelorette, Angie was famous for her appearances on Gogglebox and I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here!

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
